title: Portrait and Candid Photography
description:
Portrait and Candid Photography Photo Workshop by Erin Manning

Overview: The latest tips and tricks for capturing high-quality photos Taking great "people pictures" isn't a matter of luck. The secret is in observing your subjects and connecting with them, and then using your camera to its best advantage. This new edition uses full-color photos to demonstrate how to work with lighting, location, angle, composition, physical characteristics, and environment in either portrait or candid situations. Professional photographer and veteran author Erin Manning offers invaluable advice for handling the unique challenges of photographing babies, large and small groups, and action
